alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Van Buren, eastern Warren, northern Grundy, White and central Putnam Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1109 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cookeville to Altamont. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, McMinnville, Sparta, Spencer, Algood, Monterey, Altamont, Doyle, Beersheba Springs, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park, Rock Island State Park and Fall Creek Falls State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 283 and 303. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Grundy; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White
